TopicTitle: "Would you pay for..." thread confusion on "legacy" versions.

Articles.Content: Didn\'t SQUAD promise the ability to download all the old versions of the game (7.0 onwards) to everyone who pre-orders? Or was that rescinded?

There never was a post like this from any Squad member, it was something Sordid relayed some time ago,

So I\'ve just spoken to Harv about this. He says he plans to eventually release all the previous versions (which is to say all of them, down to the 0.0 prototype), 'soon'.

Given that nothing was mentioned of since then, it\'s a possibility that it was forgotten or like other things, it\'s another one of those matters being considered for a much, much later date.
Strange, could have sworn I heard/read something more official than that specifically relating to existing pre-orders... will need to do some digging around for it.
What I recall being saida bout existed preorders is that anybody who buys it will be able to access all new versions as they come out at no extra cost. Is this what you mean.?

The thing about getting new versions of KSP as it progresses is in the Store page before you add an order to your cart. If I remember right, that message was always there from the beginning, when the pre-order was 5USD.

That\'s something different, you get the new versions as time passes. The question here is if we\'re getting the older versions back.

I couldn\'t say, I only know of the one post from nine months ago and that might have changed without notice.
I think in Damion\'s interview with HarvesteR he said something about putting the old versions on the website to download.
